group_1.textRight: How is it?
That's nice to hear for a change!
People usually give our fried rice a C...
Not great and not terrible. Just average.
It tasted amazing when my grandpa cooked @it back in the day...
But still! Some of the customers actually@like our C grade food!
So it's, like, should we try and improve it?@Or keep it the same? It's a toughie!

group_1.textLeft: It's kinda calming... Or maybe comforting...

group_1.textRight: Oh, stop! [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]You're just saying that 'cause@you were hungry!

group_1.textLeft: I totally understand people loving it!
Haaaaa... Thanks, that really hit the spot!

group_1.textRight: Thank YOU for cleaning your plate!
Mm?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry about interrupting you during work...

group_1.textRight: Aw, don't worry about it! I was able to@finish the delivery anyway!
I'm more concerned about you. Do you really@have amnesia?
Have you remembered something now that@you've had something to eat?

group_1.textLeft: But...no, wait...@Yeah, I still only remember my name.

group_1.textRight: Wow... You don't seem too concerned about@it though.

group_1.textLeft: I may only know my own name, but...
I know I'm okay if I get hungry.

group_1.textRight: Whaddaya mean?

group_1.textLeft: If you feel hungry, it means your body has@the will to live.

group_1.textRight: Your body has the will to live!
Oh, I like that! I totally get what you mean!
What's wrong?
Tingly hair?
What? You do? [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]But you still don't remember@anything yet!

group_1.textLeft: No, but, I feel it... I gotta go...
Thanks so much for the food, Tsuruno!@I'll make this up to you sometime!
I'm looking forward to your fried rice[chara:401101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:401101:cheek_0][chara:401101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:401101:lipSynch_1]@next time we meet!

group_1.textRight: W-wait! Kazumi!
(She's already gone. I hope she'll be@okay...)
(Huh, actually...@I think I feel something too.)
(I get the feeling I'm gonna see her again.)
